title: Create Supplier Records
goal: Allow admins to add supplier entries with required name and location data.
environment: HTML + Vanilla JavaScript + Firebase + Jest + jsdom

specs.title: SupplierFormRequiresFields
specs.given: An admin opens the Supplier Master form.
specs.when: They submit with a missing supplier name or location.
specs.then: Submission is blocked, an inline error describes the missing field, and no Firestore write occurs.

specs.title: RejectDuplicateSupplierNames
specs.given: A supplier with the same name already exists (case-insensitive).
specs.when: An admin tries to add another supplier with the same name.
specs.then: The UI surfaces a duplicate warning and prevents addDoc from being called.

specs.title: PersistSupplierRecord
specs.given: An admin provides a unique supplier name and location.
specs.when: They submit the Supplier Master form.
specs.then: addDoc is invoked with trimmed values and the form resets on success.

specs.title: RenderNewSupplierInList
specs.given: A supplier add succeeds and the snapshot returns the new document.
specs.then: The list displays the supplier name and location, sorted alphabetically for quick scanning.
